name: PAC-MAN GHOSTLY ADV 2
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese.  The gang is back! Following the colorful characters and world of the PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures animated series, PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures 2 will feature PAC-MAN, Spiral and Cylindria in an all-new storyline as they defend PacWorld from the ghoulish army of Lord Betrayus.
